The alleged image used in the claim was: Washington Democratic elector Bret Chiafalo, and not Michigan Republican elector Jeremy Hashville.
There is no evidence of an elector named: either in Michigan or any other state.
No electors nationwide committed suicide: 4. The story and photo appeared on UniversePolitics.com, which included a source link to another site called WorldNewsDailyReport.com, known for publishing fictional content.
